author: Squalle Squ
comment: Works great! The only things I would change is 1, make the quantity keyboard use numbers for easier entry and 2, show the number of an items overall (included on all lists) so if I have two lists that contain eggs, it would show the overall count I need. Other than that it makes keeping shopping lists a breeze.

author: Pamela Dowe
comment: This works for me and I use it to prepare my shopping lists. That green tick that shows when I have finished and all items are accounted for I give to you - consider it my tick of approval.
title: Use it all the time

author: Jan Morrida
comment: Handy Dandy, I like the fact that I can start my list and get it on my watch and stays on while I shop. Better than getting my phone out. Thanks!

author: Jeanette Kotze
comment: Love. Would be nice if marked items auto move to bottom of list

author: O. Ohwojeheri & Co
comment: It gives you an insight.
title: Supper

author: Danie Claassen
comment: Duplicates when sync
Very useful
title: Good

author: Amanda Vasen
comment: Great.

author: Joe DeRose
comment: I loved this app for several months -- but then one day it spontaneously deleted all of my lists (even though there had been no change to the phone). Uncertain of the cause, I re-created my lists and gave it a second chance. It was fine for a few weeks, and then did the same thing again. Uninstalled.

author: Lucas Scott
comment: Latest update wiped all my lists. See you later. Moving to a service with better backup options.
title: Wiped.

author: Carlos Carpio García
comment: I installed and paid for this app because it's exactly what I've been looking for: a grocery list app with cross platform and wear devices support. My wife has an Apple Watch and I use Android Wear. However, we had two problems: 1) sync didn't always work. 2) If you want it to "kinda" work you have to have notifications enabled on iOS, which means that my wife was notified every single time I made a tiny change in the lists.     So much potential, but no update for the last 4 months.
title: Doesn't sync reliably

author: Poorvik Engineers Pvt. Ltd.
comment: Unable to share data..

author: Rahul Thakre
comment: Need back up and sync feature in order to make it perfect
title: Back up and sync

author: Olga Carvalho
comment: It doesn't sync automatically. Only when you open the app. And the pop up telling you that you need Internet connection appears every single time you open the app and you have your wi-fi off. The suggestions are a bit boring if you aren't english. Not pratical but not the worst out there.
title: Ehhh

author: Theresa Cline
comment: I cant keep my list where I want it.
title: Dont like this app

author: Phillip Garrett
comment: Since update to Android 6.0, MyGrocery has only worked intermittently. Lists display and items can be deleted, however new items cannot be added with keyboard input.
title: Android 6.0 Issues

author: Will Hopp
comment: Awesome app keeps your groceries organized

author: Alon Bm
comment: Only 1 thing is missing, reordering by unmarked items.
title: Great App

author: Bonetia Foreman
comment: My food
title: Shopping  list

author: Ido Azulay
comment: Can't  share my list

author: Jose Munoz Munoz
comment: JoseMunoz123 @Yahoo. Com
title: JoseMunoz123 @Yahoo. Com

author: Gialana Lakau
comment: My lists have been wiped out twice on account of pushing home button mid entry (accidentally) . I have about 5 lists one with 30 odd and the rest around 10 give or take. I have a 4 gb sd card as well with very little apps on. Now it seems to be taking a long time just to open (over a minute)... it would be a good app if I could truly rely on it.
title: Cant overload I guess

author: Pavel Aksyonov
comment: No one grocery app would by without built-in grocery list with user-defined products! People buy same products same time, but in this app we must manually write same products all the time (or find them in recently list).  And it's bad without sorting bought prodocts - they should be in the bottom.
title: Good app without common features

author: Andrew Littler
comment: Really, how can you expect this to me one of my main apps with ads staring st me every time I launch it?
title: Its fine, but ads?

author: aletha joines
comment: Worked good but this is now the 3rd time its completely reset itself and deletes all my lists. Uninstalling this app and finding one that will actually work!
title: Used to work good now keeps deleting my lists

author: Bryan Sobek
comment: Very responsive and easy to use app. What would make me actually want to use this is by adding categorization and a way to manually order your list.
title: Needs Categories OR Ordering

author: Samer Etk
comment: I love it, the share list so good you can keep connected with your partner and up to date with what you need and what you already finished. So simple and easy.
title: Super

author: Vasile Bula
comment: Is a nice app, but miss the ability to order the list, or the item in the list :(
title: Good but missing feature

author: Bonganl Edward
comment: Its gives me control of what usefully things i have to buy.
